ygData.subject: Re: SV: Paw, Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: If I was to hazard a guess, I would assume that the gem cutter would increase a jewel smiths skill level in a similar way that the mechanical lockpicks
ygData.messageBody:
If I was to hazard a guess, I would assume that the gem cutter would
increase a jewel smiths' skill level in a similar way that the mechanical
lockpicks provide a bonus to lockpicking. It would make sense since a lot
of jeweler's are upset about the cap imposed on their skill. This is just
a guess however.

QdP

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"

--- GoodSmritn@... wrote:
> Noone seems to care what a gem cutter does ..just that it bridges the
> gap
> between the stalking probe skill level and the aqualung skill
> level....even
> if the thing has a useful purpose im sure it will be months before
> anyone
> will find out how to do so unless Verant throws a big clue our
> way....And you
> know how likely that would be...
> Sincerely Cloverleaf <Fennin Ro Server>
